      • getEasterDate

        public static final Calendar getEasterDate(int year)
        Taken from Knuth; predicts the date upon which Easter occurs over a long forward time horizon. Not known to be perfect but is sufficient for this application; known to be invalid prior to April, 1583.
        Parameters:
        year -
        Returns:
        the date upon which Easter occurs.

      • getNextMbsPayDate

        public static int getNextMbsPayDate(GSE gse,
                    int date)
        If specified date is on or before this month's MBS payment date, return this month's MBS payment date; otherwise, return next month's MBS payment date.
        Parameters:
        gse -
        date -
        Returns:
        MBS payment date >= specified date
